body_html: I think the issue with renaming BCEWithLogitsLoss to BCELoss is that is no longer backwards compatible. i.e. people currently using BCELoss pass the input through a sigmoid first which will break with BCEWithLogitsLoss
body_text: I think the issue with renaming BCEWithLogitsLoss to BCELoss is that is no longer backwards compatible. i.e. people currently using BCELoss pass the input through a sigmoid first which will break with BCEWithLogitsLoss
body: I think the issue with renaming `BCEWithLogitsLoss` to `BCELoss` is that is no longer backwards compatible. i.e. people currently using `BCELoss` pass the input through a sigmoid first which will break with `BCEWithLogitsLoss`
